name: MetaGarden Seeds
description: MetaGarden is an ongoing series of digital and analog sculptures, drawings, VR worlds, generative and AI artworks dealing with notions of care, cultivation and "pharmakon" of technology. Placed in our ultranatural noosphere world,  seeds and Spheres of MetaGarden are all about our synthetic Other, and display unique sculpted or generated objects conceived as  hybrid things, proto-machines and ur-forms. They are inspired by simulations, cyberspace, gaming culture, and human-machine interaction. Seeds join elements from older series Universal Objects and environments from ongoing cycle MetaGarden.
